topic.title: Why Zeronet will succeed ...
topic.body:
The "internet" as we know it is a scam , every PC and phone since 2011 has a built in HARDWARE backdoor ... I have data deleted on my PC without my knolledge or permission regularly .. The internet
is well policed and dissident voices are routinely kept quiet , even the TOR network was built with Govt money I hear .. So we backup data to offline drives and keep on speading dissident info , only Peer 2 Peer networks will survive and zeronet has a fighting chance of going mainstream , it's green now but as it's userbase increases so will it's utility . I for one will only consider IPFS and P2P networks as options for the future !

topic.title: How do I "Sticky" a topic/ post ?
topic.body: Just cloned the site , now idea how to get a sticky post going , anyone know ?
